page.title: 04METAL BOX
page.content: Metal Box is the{largest factory}in the area.It was established in 1956 and manufactures 2 million cans a day.The press department produces in the region of 12 million can ends daily.Approximately{700 people}are employed.They work 3 shifts 6am-2pm 2pm-10pm and 10pm-6am.The cans are bought mainly by Batchelors,Heinz and Pedigree pet foods. Steel is produced by British steel in sheets and coils weighing about 8 tons.It arrives by road and rail.There is a{branch line } running into the factory from the main line at Chew Moor.This line is also used to take waste back to the steel works for recycling.
